content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Jan 2019What financial tips would you have given your "fresh grad" self? (assuming you have study debts and have to support the family). ?There is only so much income we can make, and job opportunities are either not ideal or don't pay well enough if we are not "above average"1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Jan 2019I dont think I will be in that situation. But first thing that must be done asap is setup a simple emergency fund and immediately pay off study debts because debts interest are guaranteed unlike investments. 0 comments0
